long_description: These Black Diamond midweight gloves are lightweight, quick drying and wind resistant. Soft and stretchy, they optimize fit and comfort. Polartec(R) Power Stretch(R) fabric features a moisture-wicking velour fleece inner face and a smooth nylon outer face that sheds light rain and wind. Goat leather palms and thumb patches add durability and gripping power; elastic band at base of wrist keeps weather and cold outside. Box finger construction enhances dexterity. Comes with a clip system for storing the gloves attached together and loops for hanging them to dry. Excellent on their own for cool-weather use, or as liners inside waterproof gloves.
short_description: These Black Diamond midweight gloves are lightweight, quick drying and wind resistant. Soft and stretchy, they optimize fit and comfort.
